attributes.action: Charge those responsible for the global banking crisis with coporate manslaughter
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Millions will die in developing countries due to the greed of western bankers creating the current recession. These people have directly caused deaths and therefore should be charged with corporate manslaughter.

rejection.details: The Government cannot charge charge or prosecute people, and the PM cannot instruct the police and CPS to charge or prosecute anyone.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
